title: Spliced Business Formations Within Four Quarters: Total for All NAICS in Michigan
notes:
This series combines (splices) BFBF4QTOTALNSAMI (https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/BFBF4QTOTALNSAMI) and BFPBF4QTOTALNSAMI (https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/BFPBF4QTOTALNSAMI) to provide the entire time series for the actual and projected business formations within four quarters.

See the U.S. Census's FAQs (https://www.census.gov/econ/bfs/faqs.html) for more details.
